mknutsen.graphicslibrary

Interface GraphicWidget

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Button, CheckersPiece, CircleGraphicObject, RectangleGraphicObject

    public interface GraphicWidget
    Handles detecting whether or not something is inside a graphic or if something is overlapping with the graphic. Created by mknutsen on 10/21/15.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isInside(int x, int y)
      is the coordinate inside the graphic
      boolean isInside(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      is the mouse event (x,y) inside the graphic
      boolean isOverlapping(GraphicWidget other)
      checks if other is overlapping the graphic
      boolean isOverlappingMaster(GraphicWidget other)
      checks if the graphics are overlapping eachother

    • Method Detail

      • isInside

        boolean isInside(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
        is the mouse event (x,y) inside the graphic
        Parameters:
        e - mouse event to check
        Returns:
        true or false

      • isInside

        boolean isInside(int x,
                 int y)
        is the coordinate inside the graphic
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate
        y - y coordinate
        Returns:
        true if inside/ false otherwise

      • isOverlapping

        boolean isOverlapping(GraphicWidget other)
        checks if other is overlapping the graphic
        Parameters:
        other - other graphic object to check with
        Returns:
        true if other is overlapping one of the corners

      • isOverlappingMaster

        boolean isOverlappingMaster(GraphicWidget other)
        checks if the graphics are overlapping eachother
        Parameters:
        other - other graphic to check against
        Returns:
        isOverLapping(other) || other.isOverlapping()
